Boost Utility Library

The Boost Utility Library isn't really a single library at all. It is just a collection for components too small to be called libraries in their own right.

But that doesn't mean there isn't useful stuff here. Take a look:

  • base_from_member
  • BOOST_BINARY
  • call_traits
  • compressed_pair
  • in_place_factory
  • iterator_adaptors
  • operators
  • result_of
  • throw_exception
  • utility
  • string_ref
  • value_init

Over time useful stuff here has moved to more appropriate Boost libraries:

  • addressof (moved to Boost.Core)
  • checked_delete (moved to Boost.Core)
  • declval (moved to Boost.TypeTraits)
  • enable_if (moved to Boost.Core)
  • generator iterator adaptors (moved to Boost.Iterator)
  • next/prior (moved to Boost.Iterator)
  • noncopyable (moved to Boost.Core)
  • ostream_string (moved to Boost.IO)
